useCase.name: Booking a Football Pitch

preconditions.precondition: The customer must select a football pitch.

successEndConditions.condition: The football pitch is successfully booked.

failureEndConditions.condition: The booking of the football pitch fails.

useCase.trigger: The customer triggers the booking process.

mainSequence.step: The system receives the selected time slot.
The system checks the availability of the time slot.
The system allows booking the time slot.
Customer successfully books the football pitch.
